\\
\hline
\verb+N+ & Uchar & - & - & Parameter & Standard & 3 & Number of Stages\\

\hline
\verb+M+ & Uchar & - & - & Parameter & Standard & 1 & Differential Delay\\

\hline
\verb+R+ & Ushort & - & - & Parameter & Standard & 4 & Decimation Factor. 1 output for every R inputs.\\

\hline
\verb+DIN_WIDTH+ & Uchar & - & - & Parameter & Standard & 16 & Width of I and Q as they appear on the input port\\

\hline

\hline
\verb+DOUT_WIDTH+ & Uchar & - & - & Parameter & Standard & 16 & Width of I and Q as they appear on the output port\\

\hline
